      • readBanks_epgEvents

        public boolean readBanks_epgEvents(org.jlab.io.base.DataEvent event)
        Read all banks (event parameters, particles, detectors ...) and return true if event has at least an electron, a proton and a photon, else return false.
        Parameters:
        event - event to analyze
        Returns:
        true if this event has at least an electron, a proton and a photon
